description: This schema represents an organization or account.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the account.

email.description: The email address of the account.

has_contributed.description: Whether the user has contributed data.

account_type.description: Indicates whether the account is part of an organization or for an individual.

individual_role.description: Indicates the area the individual represents (e.g. student, researcher, industry).

organization.description: The organization that an account is affiliated with.

organization_type.description: The type of organization that an account represents.

name.description: this is the name of the organization an account is affiliated with.
